attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I think it is high time Big Brother was Banned, actually for
     the sake and protection of those involved. Especially Celebrity
     Big Brother. Can anyone still go on it and be naive, I believe
     so. Big Brother exploits people, it sets things up that clearly
     treats human beings very poorly and without dignity. I do not
     genuinely believe, especially the celebrity one that people
     realize the potential damage that taking part in such a show
     can produce. This was all to obvious in the recent disgraceful
     celebrity BB in January 2007. Big Brother does not seem to care
     if people are humiliated and have there lives totally ruined,
     all in the name of entertainment, rather viewing figures at all
     costs.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
